thread.title: Porsha
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Porsha

author: Porsha
title: Porsha
text: When I initially walked in the store, I had my mind set on something particular I wanted. Mary approached me and immediately made me feel welcomed. She then began to show me the products I was interested in, as well as alternatives. I was completely undecided, but she made it so much easier. If it was not for her help, I would have walked out without purchasing anything because she was the only helpful person in there.
